verses.verse: <S%H1078>Bel<s%> bows <S%H3766>down,<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo<s%> <S%H7164>stoops;<s%> their <S%H6091>idols<s%> are on the <S%H2416>animals,<s%> and on the <S%H929>livestock:<s%> the things that you <S%H5385>carried<s%> about are made a <S%H6006>load,<s%> a <S%H4853>burden<s%> to the <S%H5889>weary.<s%>

They <S%H7164>stoop,<s%> they bow <S%H3766>down<s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%> they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H4422>deliver<s%> the <S%H4853>burden,<s%> but <S%H5315>themselves<s%> have <S%H1980>gone<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>

<S%H8085>"Listen<s%> to <S%H1004>me,<s%> house of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and all the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that have been <S%H6006>borne<s%> from their <S%H990>birth,<s%> that have been <S%H5375>carried<s%> from the <S%H7356>womb;<s%>

and even to old <S%H2209>age<s%> I am <S%H7872>he,<s%> and even to gray hairs will I <S%H5445>carry<s%> <S%H6213>you.<s%> I have made, and I will <S%H5375>bear;<s%> <S%H5445>yes,<s%> I will carry, and will <S%H4422>deliver.<s%>
"To whom will you <S%H1819>liken<s%> <S%H7737>me,<s%> and make me equal, and <S%H4911>compare<s%> <S%H1819>me,<s%> that we may be like?

Some <S%H2107>pour<s%> out <S%H2091>gold<s%> from the <S%H3599>bag,<s%> and <S%H8254>weigh<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> in the <S%H7070>balance.<s%> They <S%H7936>hire<s%> a <S%H6884>goldsmith,<s%> and he <S%H6213>makes<s%> it a <S%H410>god.<s%> They fall <S%H5456>down<s%>â€”yes, they <S%H7812>worship.<s%>

They <S%H5375>bear<s%> it on the <S%H3802>shoulder,<s%> they <S%H5445>carry<s%> <S%H3240>it,<s%> and set it in its place, and it <S%H5975>stands,<s%> from its <S%H4725>place<s%> it shall not <S%H4185>move:<s%> <S%H6817>yes,<s%> one may cry to <S%H6030>it,<s%> yet it can not answer, nor <S%H3467>save<s%> him out of his <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>
<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> <S%H377>this,<s%> and show yourselves men; bring it <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3820>mind,<s%> you <S%H6586>transgressors.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> the former <S%H7223>things<s%> of <S%H5769>old:<s%> for I am <S%H410>God,<s%> and there is none <S%H430>else;<s%> I am God, and there is <S%H657>none<s%> like <S%H3644>me;<s%>

<S%H5046>declaring<s%> the <S%H319>end<s%> from the <S%H7225>beginning,<s%> and from ancient <S%H6924>times<s%> things that are not yet <S%H6213>done;<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> My <S%H6098>counsel<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand,<s%> and I will <S%H6213>do<s%> all my <S%H2656>pleasure;<s%>

<S%H7121>calling<s%> a ravenous <S%H5861>bird<s%> from the <S%H4217>east,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of my <S%H6098>counsel<s%> from a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>country;<s%> <S%H1696>yes,<s%> I have spoken, I will also <S%H935>bring<s%> it to <S%H3335>pass;<s%> I have purposed, I will also do <S%H6213>it.<s%>
<S%H8085>Listen<s%> to <S%H47>me,<s%> you stout-hearted, who are far <S%H7350>from<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness:<s%>

I bring <S%H7126>near<s%> my <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> it shall not be far <S%H7368>off,<s%> and my <S%H8668>salvation<s%> shall not <S%H309>wait;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>place<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%> my <S%H8597>glory.<s%>
